column5: Well my wife wanted to go to Cliff Lake and cast for some muskies.We had a couple come to the boat one not to bad and both if us had a fish in a tip water and both got off.So ended up getting a small one each.Why cant the big ines be as aggressive as the small ones.Got a few pike also. Saw smallmouth bass in that clear water shooting up from the bittom to catch bugs.That was real interesting watching that.Could of caught a ton if bass i think but we wanted to change up but stuck to the muskies.Cliff is definately a beautifull lake.Awesome weather once again and only boat on the lake. A guy can get used to that.
Iâ€™d be happy with those fish!
Beautiful looking lake,the muskies are really quite beautiful, also, even the small ones have a mystic all to themselves. Bill

Thx guys.Definatly a good day all around.Small fish are still fun to catch then no fish.Had our chances and saw some fish in some of the cleanest water in NWO.Feel lucky to be able to enjoy our awesome lakes in the area.
